<<code language="ocaml" | sig
  val doc_start : unit

  type html = Html5_types.div Eliom_content.Html5.elt

  class type ['a] reqm =
    object
      method clear : unit
      method get : 'a
      method get_opt : 'a option
      method has : bool
      method set : 'a -> unit
      method to_html : Eba_reqm.html
    end
  type set
  type 'a cons
  val cons : 'a Eba_reqm.cons
  val create_set : string -> Eba_reqm.set
  val create :
    ?cons:'a Eba_reqm.cons ->
    ?set:Eba_reqm.set ->
    ?default:(unit -> 'a) ->
    to_html:('a -> Eba_reqm.html) -> unit -> 'a Eba_reqm.reqm
  val to_html : #Eba_reqm.reqm_base -> Eba_reqm.html
  val set : 'a Eba_reqm.reqm -> 'a -> unit
  val push : 'a list Eba_reqm.reqm -> 'a -> unit
  val get : 'a Eba_reqm.reqm -> 'a
  val get_opt : 'a Eba_reqm.reqm -> 'a option
  val has : 'a Eba_reqm.reqm -> bool
  val clear : 'a Eba_reqm.reqm -> unit

  val to_list : Eba_reqm.set -> Eba_reqm.reqm_base list
end >>
